animeTitle: Himote House: Dai Panic! Minna de Gokiburi Taiji
otherNames: Himote House Episode 10.5, Himote House OVA, ひもてはうす大パニック！みんなでゴキブリ退治
synopsis: OVA project crowdfunded through Green Funding. It's an extra episode of Himote House which was originally planned to air during the series' TV broadcast, but couldn't due to production difficulties.
